name: Platform-r2
body:
### Platform-r2
untitled RPG. So far its just a combat prototype.

[Download Nightly Build](https://github.com/explosivo/platform-r2/blob/master/platform-r2.jar?raw=true)
### Controls
WASD to move

mouse to aim and fire laser gun

M to mute and unmute music
### Tips
using weapons drains stamina

killings zombies gains XP

gaining Levels increases your stamina, health, and speed

for fps stats run in terminal 'Java -jar platform-r2.jar'
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
